summary: Build an approval flow where the PDF is visible and can be viewed and downloaded during approval.
architectural_notes: Ensure approval workflow includes attachment/PDF handling that supports in-browser viewing and file download.
known_issues: PDF attachment is not currently showing on the approval screen (users cannot view/download during approval).

existing_features.title: On the approval UI (Application Status Management), when an application status has a PDF attachment, display an inline PDF preview and provide explicit “View PDF” and “Download PDF” actions so approvers can reliably view and download the attached document during approval.

Ensure the public approval/result screen (Australian Visa Status Check) continues to render the PDF attachment section with a preview (when available) and always provides view and download actions for the returned attachment bytes.

new_feature_requests.summary: On the approval screen, display the PDF so approvers can view it and download it.
